Class BocasServices

java.lang.Object
  net.derquinse.common.base.NotInstantiable
      net.derquinse.bocas.BocasServices

@Beta
public final class BocasServices
extends NotInstantiable

Factory class for Bocas services and repositories.

Method Summary
static CachingBocasBuilder cache()
          Creates a new caching repository builder.
static Bocas direct()
          Creates a new memory-based repository based on direct buffers.
static Bocas fallback(Bocas primary, Bocas fallback)
          Creates a new bocas repository based on a primary and a fallback one.
static Bocas memory()
          Creates a new heap-based repository.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

memory

public static Bocas memory()
Creates a new heap-based repository.

direct

public static Bocas direct()
Creates a new memory-based repository based on direct buffers.

cache

public static CachingBocasBuilder cache()
Creates a new caching repository builder.

fallback

public static Bocas fallback(Bocas primary,
                             Bocas fallback)
Creates a new bocas repository based on a primary and a fallback one. Writes are not propagated to the fallback repository.
